r.s: Native Extension Component for ScoutAPM's PHP Agent
r.d: ScoutAPM's extension for PHP provides additional capabilities to application monitoring over just using the base PHP userland library.
r.n: - Basic monitoring of file_get_contents, file_put_contents, fwrite, fread, curl_exec, PDO->exec, PDO->query, PDOStatement->execute - Provides function scoutapm_get_calls() to return a list of recorded function calls
